attributes.review: Wow. Just wow. This app is RIDICULOUS. I asked amazon Alexa what app would be best to keep up with the presidential elections and she suggested this one. Right after she said the word â€œTrumpâ€ she began to speak Italian and made the lights in my room turn red.  It was almost as if Alexa had started the Trump purge. After that happened, I signed into the app only to find that it consisted of a monkey like man talking about politics. Woah! What is this? Something from Dr.Seuss? Unbelievable. Even my dog ran away after hearing the word Republican.
attributes.title: Trump purge

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted information on the ban of tik tok but then my phone stopped working and then I restarted it and the next thing you know, my phone screen had trump and all my apps were changed to look like trumps face. I went to my emails and they were all deleted and it was flooded with Trump emails, apparently he had a dinner with the Russian President and he hooked up with a woman named Anya and sent a doc to the president that basically said to keep it on the low low. My camera roll was pictures of a red background and some of them had MAGA. All of my Instagram pictures had TRUMP 2020 on it and it ruined my page. I opened my fridge and there was a Trump 2020 hat on my lasagna leftovers and I moved it and someone printed MAGA on my leftovers. I looked around and I saw Trump 2020 stickers all over my wall. Trump himself came to my house and said if I donâ€™t decorate it more, he was going to deport me back to China but I wasnâ€™t from China. He said he didnâ€™t care because he was done with the Kung Flu people. Iâ€™m now on a plane, to Shanghai, hope it was worth sending me back you orange CheetoğŸ–•-1/73838 not recommended
